Reference version 0.0.0.9000

Core packages that install and load with fgeo

These packages automatically install in one step, when you install fgeo with install_github("forestgeo/fgeo"); and they also load in one step, when you run library(fgeo).

forestr

forestr: Analyze abundance and basal area.

map

map: Map ForestGEO's data.

Other packages that install but don't load with fgeo

These packages automatically install in one step, when you install fgeo with install_github("forestgeo/fgeo"); but if you want to use them, you must first manually load each of them with library(package_you_want).

bciex

bciex: Data sets for examples -- from Barro Colorado Island.

Suggested packages that don't install nor load with fgeo

These packages don’t install nor load with fgeo. They are suggested here because you may find them useful. But if you want to use them, you must first manually install and load each of them.

BIOMASS

BIOMASS: Estimate above-ground biomass in tropical forests.

ctfs

ctfs: Legacy code from the CTFS-R Package.

fgeo.demography

fgeo.demography: Analyze recruitment, mortality and growth.

soilkrig

soilkrig: Krig soil data as per John et al. (2007).

try

try: Try new code before it is released.
